derivation: or שִׁלְשֹׁם; from the same as H8028 (שֶׁלֶשׁ);
outline:
1. day before yesterday, three days ago
    1. an idiom for 'heretofore in times past'
kjv_def: [phrase] before (that time, -time), excellent things (from the margin), [phrase] heretofore, three days, [phrase] time past.
strongs_def: trebly, i.e. (in time) day before yesterday
